a.h1:
Lawrenceburg Community School Corporation
Learners. Leaders. Legacy.

div.div: This search form uses an instant search feature. As you type, search results will appear automatically below the search field. When you've entered you desired search terms use tab to navigate through the available results and hit enter to open the selected page or document.

div.p: This page was updated on April 7, 2020 with information regarding continuity of instruction, learning, and food services based on Governor Holcomb's order to close all schools through the end of the 2019-2020 school year.

4-7-20 Community Letter - This letter updates parents, students, staff, and community members on the school corporation's plan regarding the school calendar, following Governor Holcomb's order to close schools through the rest of the school year.
Week of 4/20 Breakfast and Lunch Menu - Click here to access the menu for all meals that will be delivered or available for pickup from April 20-24.
Click here to access the district's continuous learning plan.

p.a: School Board Resolution to Pay Employees
